name: GEMS Air Programme
description: real-time air pollution monitoring and exposure
SDGevidence:
This application provides real-time estimates for PM2.5 (11.6.2) globally at high resolution.  It applies AI and statistical methods to scale estimates and estimate real-time exposure to air pollution.

https://www.unenvironment.org/explore-topics/air/what-we-do/monitoring-air-quality
